entity.name: Head of Global Business Services (GBS)
entity.message:
The
GBS Leader oversees all globally distributed Shared Service Centers (SSCs) and
is responsible for the management of SSC footprint, digitalization of services
and transformation from a functional to an integrated end-to-end process
organization. The leader promotes the GBS idea to business/functional
leadership and expansion of functional/ geographical scope to add value for the
organization.
entity.enterpriseKeywords: Head of Global Business Services, GBS
